# Preface {-}

This study aims to analysis spatial distribution of seedling from
three Amazonian tree species (*Dicorynia guianensis*, *Symphonia globulifera* 
and *Tachigali melinonii*) inventoried in the 
experimental site of Paracou, French Guiana.
